summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to improve Elliott Avenue West, from West Mercer Place to 15th Avenue West, and 15th Avenue West, from Elliott Avenue West to West Garfield Street, by paving the same and doing such other work as may be necessary, providing for the making and repayment of a temporary loan from the General Road & Bridge Fund to Local Improvement Fund, District No. 3280, to pay the cost and expense of said improvement, and appropriating money therefor, and declaring an emergency.
